name: BLIT CITY
description:
Blit City is a small game made in November 2017.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys, along with space bar and the 'M' Key, to navigate Blit City, smashing other cars and avoiding the cops.  Trade in Scrap, Gold and Cadavers to earn the most cash.

Game by Kyle Dwyer (@_KPDwyer) & Mackenzie Eaton  (@Macktimus)
